description: Open /wp-admin/ in a browser.
Adds, removes, fetches, and flushes the WP Object Cache object.

subcommands.name: add
subcommands.description: Adds a value to the object cache.

subcommands.name: decr
subcommands.description: Decrements a value in the object cache.

subcommands.name: delete
subcommands.description: Removes a value from the object cache.

subcommands.name: flush
subcommands.description: Flushes the object cache.

subcommands.name: get
subcommands.description: Gets a value from the object cache.

subcommands.name: incr
subcommands.description: Increments a value in the object cache.

subcommands.name: replace
subcommands.description: Replaces a value in the object cache.

subcommands.name: set
subcommands.description: Sets a value to the object cache.

subcommands.name: type
subcommands.description: Attempts to determine which object cache is being used.

description: Adds, removes, and lists capabilities of a user role.

subcommands.name: version
subcommands.description: Prints WP-CLI version.

subcommands.description: Lists variables, constants, and file includes defined in wp-config.php file.

subcommands.description: Refreshes the salts defined in the wp-config.php file.

subcommands.description: Removes all tables from the database.
